sub_title: MSc Construction Management and Engineering/ Project management/Construction Engineer/Cost Engineer/Infrastructure Engineer
summary:
As a recent graduate of the Master's course in Construction Management and Engineering at the Delft University of Technology, I am excited to take on new challenges and opportunities in the industrial construction field. While I am a newcomer to this industry, I am eager to apply the knowledge and skills that I have gained through my education and past experiences to add value to any project that I am a part of.

With a proven track record of success as a nationally certified construction manager and cost engineer in China, I have developed a diverse skill set in project management and construction management, including collaboration, leadership, and quality control. I am confident that I can bring these skills to a new role as a project engineer, project control engineer, or cost engineer, and am eager to learn and grow as a professional in this field.

Overall, I am committed to making a positive impact on any project I am involved in and look forward to contributing to the success and sustainability of the industrial construction industry as a whole.

projects.title: Guilin International Convention and Exhibition Center
projects.description: This is a large-scale, multi-purpose complex that includes conference, exhibition, commercial, and hospitality facilities. Phase I covers approximately 397,000 square meters, with a planned land area of about 750 mu. It features 60,000 square meters of indoor exhibition space, 50,000 square meters of outdoor exhibition space, a 15,000 square meter conference center, and two reception centers (one four-star and one five-star) with a combined total of 800 guest rooms. The project site was selected in 2017, and conceptual planning, landscape design, and architectural scheme design were approved in October 2018. As the owner's representative, I collaborated with consultants and design agents to submit the architectural design plan for government review and was responsible for demonstrating and implementing the PPP plan.

contributors.headline: MSc Construction Management and Engineering/ Project management/Construction Engineer/Cost Engineer/Infrastructure Engineer

projects.title: City Planning and Construction Exhibition Hall
projects.description:
My tasks are:
-Made a research plan, and visited exhibition halls in Guangzhou, Foshan, Zhuhai, Xi'an, and Chengdu
-Collected construction scale information, management experience, and financial data of these five exhibition halls
-Completed a financial feasibility report and made a presentation to heads of the Guilin Municipal Government for offering my advice on the construction scale of and investment in the exhibition hall
-Prepared project procurement strategy and plan, and be responsible for project procurement
-In charge of bidding, budget and contract 
-In charge of setting up a data collection working group, holding work meetings, and assigning tasks
-In charge of construction supervision and progress payment

contributors.headline: MSc Construction Management and Engineering/ Project management/Construction Engineer/Cost Engineer/Infrastructure Engineer

projects.title: The National Green Ecological Demonstration District
projects.description:
The National Green Ecological Demonstration District is a concept proposed to promote the use of local renewable energy and resources in accordance with local conditions in the new urban areas of the city, and to promote the large-scale development of green buildings.

The government department where I work is responsible for the development and management of the new urban administrative center area. The project I am responsible for is to declare this new urban area as a national green ecological demonstration area to enhance the appeal of the new area. My main tasks are:
-Applied for green eco-city district and established the eco-city indicator system of Lingui New District
-Participated in relevant forums and meetings
-Applied the eco-city indicator system to construction projects

projects.title: China-Singapore Tianjin Eco-City Research
projects.description:
-Held a forum where I communicated with heads of the committee and summed up the experiences of both success and failure in the process of constructing and managing the eco-city
-Completed a report for analyzing differences between the construction and feasibility of Guilin’s and Tianjin’s eco-cities

company.name: Hunan Xinyan Construction Engineering Co., Ltd.

profile_positions.company: Hunan Xinyan Construction Engineering Co., Ltd.
profile_positions.description:
As a construction project manager for a remote team, my main responsibilities included participating in the preparation and review of bid proposals and documents; establishing a project budget; developing a comprehensive project plan, including timelines and milestones; and providing expertise and advice on construction methodology, building systems, and other technical aspects of the project, to ensure that it is constructible and feasible. 

Validate access: https://jzsc.mohurd.gov.cn/data/person
profile_positions.title: Project Manager & Cost Manager

profile_positions.description:
Project: Cell Therapy Facility
Supported Site Supervisors and Construction Managers in managing construction sites of a Cell Therapy Facility, ensuring compliance with safety regulations and addressing constructability issues. Facilitated communication and collaboration between teams, implemented Lean and Agile methodologies to improve project management processes, and created and monitored integrated look-ahead plans for subcontractors to align with project milestones.

Completed my master's thesis on the topic of "How to planning and control complex EPC construction projects" under this project
profile_positions.title: Construction Engineer

company.name: Management Committee of Lingui New District

profile_positions.company: Management Committee of Lingui New District
profile_positions.description:
Played different roles in project management, I oversaw 100+ infrastructure projects worth 12M+ euros, including municipal drainage, urban roads, pipeline works, and electrical facility construction. I utilized data collection and monitoring techniques to ensure on-time and on-budget project delivery. I developed and executed procurement and risk management strategies, led contractor and vendor selection and contract negotiation, and coordinated cross-functional teams. I reviewed project planning and associated detailed planning to ensure project efficiency, scheduled regular meetings with stakeholders and team members, and facilitated dispute resolution. I led project completion and acceptance, maintained quality compliance, and implemented robust quality management systems. 

Key skills: project and risk management, procurement, team coordination, project control, quality management, and contract, budget and schedule hands-on execution.
profile_positions.title: Junior Project Manager/ Project control manager ( Infrastructure Sector)

company.name: Management Committee of Lingui New District

profile_positions.company: Management Committee of Lingui New District
profile_positions.description:
As an owner's representative, I managed public building projects valued at over 6 billion, such as the International Convention and Exhibition Centre and the City Exhibition Hall. I led project planning, scheduling, and coordination with contractors to ensure on-time, on-budget delivery. I acted as the primary liaison between the owner and construction team to ensure design intent was met, monitored progress and compliance, and reviewed all construction documents. 

My advanced project management skills enabled me to utilize software tools to track progress, identify areas for improvement and provide transparent reports. I also assisted in procurement and risk management strategies. Key skills include proposal and business tendering, cost management, risk management, building design and construction knowledge, coordination and communication with various stakeholders, efficient time management and organizational skills, and familiarity with project management software and tools.
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer (Urban planning and Building sector)

profile_positions.description:
As a property asset manager, I oversaw a large portfolio of commercial and residential properties, managing day-to-day operations and ensuring that all properties were well-maintained and operating efficiently. I implemented preventative maintenance plans to minimize costs and maximize the lifespan of assets, prepared and managed property budgets, and acted as the main point of contact for tenants, vendors, and contractors. I also developed and maintained positive relationships with stakeholders and implemented policies to ensure compliance with all legal and regulatory requirements. Through my leadership, I successfully maximized returns and minimized risks for the properties under my management.

Key skills:

Life-cycle management of large property assets, including construction management and preventative maintenance planning
Budget preparation and financial analysis
Tenant and vendor management, customer service, and conflict resolution
Compliance with legal and regulatory requirements
Strategic thinking and market trend analysis
Leadership and team management
profile_positions.title: Department Manager of Property management (Residence and Commercial Building)

profile_positions.description:
-Learned asset and team management knowledge and techniques
-Provided a fresh perspective and recommend potential improvements on current processes
-Assisted project managers with training for junior staff
-Worked independently on the reception and presentation of projects to potential investors and clients
-Worked with multiple departments to complete a number of large scale publicity campaigns
-Participated in the delivery of several projects (real estate and commercial estate)
